snippet: STEINER--Paul. The partners, counsel, associates, and staff of DLA Piper LLP express our deepest sympathy to our partner and friend Jeffrey Steiner on the sudden loss of his father, Paul Steiner. We extend sincere condolences to Jeffrey and to all of his family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: STEINER--Paul. The partners, counsel, associates, and staff of DLA Piper LLP express our deepest sympathy to our partner and friend Jeffrey Steiner on the sudden loss of his father, Paul Steiner. We extend sincere condolences to Jeffrey and to all of his family. 1/3
